name: Oil & Gas - Investment research
plan: Decision support team through comprehensive, data-driven assessments...

agents.name: OilGasKnowledge
agents.description: An agent that has access to a knowledge base of International Energy Agency (IEA) Analysis and forecast to 2030 and can handle RAG tasks, call this agent if you are getting questions on your knowledge base.

description: Team helping with decision support on comprehensive, data-driven assessment of current market forecasts, commodity price trends, and OPEC announcements.

starting_tasks.name: Market assessment
starting_tasks.prompt: Use advanced financial modelling, scenario analysis, geopolitical forecasting, and risk quantification to produce a comprehensive, data-driven assessment of current market forecasts, commodity price trends, and OPEC announcements. In this process, identify and deeply evaluate the relative growth potential of various upstream investment areasâ€”ranging from unconventional reservoirs to deepwater projects and advanced EOR techniquesâ€”across Africa, the Middle East, and Central Europe. Based on publicly available data (e.g., IEA, EIA, and OPEC bulletins), synthesize your findings into specific, country-level recommendations that incorporate ROI calculations, scenario-based risk assessments, and robust justifications reflecting both market and geopolitical considerations. Present the final deliverable as a well-structured tableâ€‹
starting_tasks.creator: system
